name: Breville Commercial Juice Fountain XL Pro, Brushed Stainless Steel, CJE830BSS1BNA1

other_info.Special Feature: Whole Fruit Processing, Pulp Control, Removable Blade

about_this_item: The Juice Fountain XL Pro brings the bar industry’s favorite centrifugal juicer from Breville to the commercial space. A speed selection dial allows you to maximize your juice yield whether you’re working with citrus, soft fruits, or hard vegetables.
VARIABLE SPEED: Speed adjustability allows you to maximize your juice yield from your produce whether you’re working with citrus, soft fruits, or hard vegetables.
SHORT PREP TIME: The Breville Juice Fountain Cold XL Pro's unique 3.5 inch extra wide chute feed allows you to juice whole fruits and vegetables without pre-cutting
LESS MESS: The juice nozzle eliminates mess when juicing directly into serving cups.

COLD SPIN TECHNOLOGY: Cold Spin Technology allows juice to flow up and through the stainless steel cutting disc surrounded by an Italian-made mesh filter to ensure an insignificant temperature increase.

title: Best juicer
content: This is by far the best juicer I’ve ever had.  I’ve have many juicers, both slow masticating and centrifugal juicers.  The masticating are great if you have the time or patience to wait for the juice.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I can’t stop raving about it.  You don’t have to chop any fruits or veggies, just wash.  There is no pulp just smooth juice.  It takes less than a minute to juice enough for a half a pitcher.  Maybe more but I haven’t tried.  It’s super easy to disassemble and wash.  It is heavy duty and large. I know it will last and is a good investment for my health.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2024

title: High quality machine
content: This isn’t a paid advertisement but I’d do a commercial for Breville if I could.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Staying at a hotel in Germany I enjoyed fresh pressed vegetable juice. Upon arrival back in the US I searched for a high quality cold press juicer. I am very pleased with this stainless steel machine. Clean up is easy the - fruit and vegetable juices are fantastic. Highly recommended!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023

title: A juicer that performs!
content: This is the best juicer I’ve owned. It has great performance, extraction is superior. Easy to use and clean up was fast .
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Handles all types of fruits and veggies without a problem. Produces great volumes of juice, and is much easier to clean up than prior brands I've had. The scrub brush included is a great bonus. Speed knob helps with produce thats more bulky, but I haven't had a reason to use it passed 50% yet. It tears through everything without a problem. Noise level is not bad, and the material left in the catch bucket is pretty dry compared to other brands. So far I'm happy with this purchase.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2024

title: Good
content: I used to have old juicer where i had to slice up the veggies/fruits.. once i changed to this machine my life changed! Its so convenient that i didnt have to choo them, and the engine is so much quieter even though the machine is much stronger. I love the look of the stainless steel finish it looks so clean and nice on the countertop. 100% recommend this macine if you are juicing!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This is our first juicer and wanted it to last us a while, we had a great deal on it when amazon presented the price so I had to snag it.  The Juicer is great overall and very fast to create juice when doing watermelon, apples, carrots etc... Although the spin is fast, it does creates foam when it hits the jug, so you would have to let it settle, unless you like the foam.  Overall, very satisfied with the machine and have been using it regularly, clean it is great, very well made and heavy so it doesnt vibrate off your table.  Recommend to purchase if you're in a market for one.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023

title: Love it
content: Great for juicing a variety of veg and fruit: Carrots, apples, pears, celery, ginger root and leafy greens all pass through easily. Yields drier pulp which indicates juice yield is higher due to more efficient extraction. Jicing is quicker and quieter than other juicers i ahve owned. Large feeder chute accommodates whole apples and pears.
